description: Smartwool's Hike Light Cushion Crew, formerly PhD® Outdoor,  is designed to help take care of your feet and elevate every hike. they've updated their best hike socks to include more sustainable materials, improved durability, updated mesh zones, and an even more perfect fit. their top sock technologies work together with responsibly sourced, ZQ-certified Merino wool to help you perform with natural fibers. Light cushioning along the entire bottom of the sock brings more comfort to your favorite hiking shoe or boot. Recycled nylon brings more sustainability to their sock construction and a crew height helps keep you covered as you set out on even the most rugged trails. Bring more comfort on every hike with Smartwool.
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Spiked Stripe Crew Socks - Mens
